name: Seekers: Aldric (Demo)
description:
Features
  • Unique battle system focused around resource management.
  • Story-rich items expanding the world.
  • Extra rewards for doing well in combat.
  • A story filled with mystery and secrets to look out for.
Story

Since the beginning of civilization, a tale has been passed down, the origin of which has been lost to time.

“It is written, At the end of days.

The Savior will rise, With wondrous Grace.

Once he appears, Our hope will turn.

When he appears, Evil will burn…

Until that day, The Savior will stay,

Locked away, Until that day…”

"...He is unworthy of it..."

Welcome to Lingard, a world where almost every person is born with magic abilities connecting to an element such as fire, earth, air, and many more.

With these magic abilities, civilizations were able to rise and flourish across the land. Leading to the creation of many things, one of which being the Union Of Mages.

The year is 1513, the relations between Lingard's two biggest kingdoms (Veskallia and Cornell) are stressed, now the world waits for the next war to begin. In order to relieve some fear that the citizens feel, the Union Of Mages has decided to continue with the annual Battle mage tournament, where the highest ranking students across the world are brought together to see who is more skilled in their element.

You are one of those students, on their way to the event. The first step is to get to Hamrar, meet a friend, who was also selected for the event as well, and then make your way to the capital. Hopefully there isn't any danger along the way.

"...Can...hear...? ...have...tell you...days left...next cy-"

Control Types
  • Keyboard and Mouse
  • Controller
Additional Notes

Please let me know if you find any issues while playing the game. I went through it thoroughly on my own, but it is just me working on this so there may be some bugs left in it that I haven't found yet.
